title: Inception
sinopsis: A skilled thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets...

title: The Shawshank Redemption
sinopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight
sinopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham...

title: Forrest Gump
sinopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
